title: Hack the Reverse Road Trip for Major Savings
description:
Road trip season doesn't have to end when the summer does - in fact, there are many reasons to get out onto the open road all year round. In this episode of Out Travel the System, host  Nisreene Atassi  gets the insider scoop on where and when to time your car rental to coordinate with your larger travel plans or score epic  reverse road trip  savings. She's joined on the journey by  Paul Tomasiello, Expedia's  Sr. Director of Global Car Supply, and  Megan Lundquist , an extremely expert road tripper.

Listen in for tips on road safety, packing like a road trip superstar, and even their confessions about road trip indulgences - all that and more in this episode of Out Travel the System.
